# LLMs TXT Generator

> A Node.js tool for generating `llms.txt` and `llms-full.txt` files, providing standardized documentation formats for AI models to better understand project structures.

## Core Documentation
- [README](docs/README.md): Project introduction, features, installation, and usage instructions.
- [LLM Usage Guide](docs/LLM_USAGE.md): Guidelines on how to use the LLM class with OpenAI SDK.

## Optional Content
- [Generate Prompt](src/llm/prompts/generate.md): Instructions for creating llms.txt and llms-full.txt files.
